content: this pattern gives instructions for making this gorgeous slouch hat - i also call it my loc tam since i designed it to pin up my locs when i don t want them hanging down my neck its designed in one general size however it is easy to adjust the width and/or height simply by changing the hook size and/or repeating or omitting a specific round in the pattern this pattern is written in american english with standard u s terms this slouchy works up quickly with awesome texture and would make the perfect gift for anyone in your life especially the ones with big hair also this hat makes a great addition to your next craft fair or market materials yarn - any 4 weight rhss ombre was used for this demonstration yardage - 175-200 yds hooks - 6 5mm / 5 0mm beads optional for the ends of the drawstring this pattern is for personal use you may not alter sell transfer trade copy distribute or claim this pattern or its images as your own you may sell your finished product made with this pattern please credit love n every stitch by rubybaby
